·Vietnamese,Thai,Malay and Indonesian are supported.
·Performance refined for iDol Culb.
·Updated user privacy.
-----------------------------------------------
If you have any advice and feedback, please send email to intlmangotv@hotmail.com.We aim at providing the best experience to our customers.

《Meet the Temple of Heaven》-The first-ever variety public show shooting in this ancient architecture over 600 years！#YangMi , #Angelababy and #Dilraba tell you mysterious stories happened on the Temple of Heaven happened every Friday 9p.m.！
《Rainbow Town》-The romantic and sweetness love Chinese drama between Aom Sushar and new ‘F4’ !
-----------------------------------------------
If you have any advice and feedback, please send email to intlmangotv@hotmail.com.We aim at providing the best experience to our customers.
